TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class StateManagedCollection : System.Collections.IList, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StateManagedCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class StateManagedCollection Implements IList, IStateManager
public ref class StateManagedCollection abstract : System::Collections::IList, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 为管理 对象的所有强类型集合提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for all strongly typed collections that manage objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是存储的所有强类型集合的基类元素，其中包括， ， ， ，和其他人。The class is the base class for all strongly typed collections that store elements, including , , , , and others. 集合管理其自己的状态，以及它包含的元素的状态。The collection manages its own state as well as the state of the elements it contains. 因此，调用将保存该集合的状态和集合当前包含的所有元素的状态。Therefore, a call to saves the state of the collection and the state of all the elements currently contained by the collection. 最重要的方法要考虑从派生时类， ， ， ，和。The most important methods to consider when deriving from the class are , , , , and . 和方法用于存储视图状态的类型包含的元素的索引。The and methods are used to store an index in view state for the type of a contained element. 存储索引，而不是完全限定的类型名称可以提高性能。Storing an index rather than a fully qualified type name improves performance. 每当操作集合中的元素，就会调用方法并验证根据业务规则的元素。The method is called whenever elements of the collection are manipulated, and validates the elements according to business rules. 目前，实现方法禁止`null`对象从存储在集合; 但是，您可以重写此方法在派生类型中定义你自己的验证行为。Currently, the implementation of the method prohibits `null` objects from being stored in the collection; however, you can override this method to define your own validation behavior in a derived type. 方法强制将整个集合序列化为视图状态，而不是只序列化的最后时间以来对状态所做的更改加载它。The method forces the entire collection to be serialized to view state, rather than just serializing changes made to state since the last time it was loaded. 方法是一个抽象方法，可实现来执行此相同的行为在元素级别。The method is an abstract method you can implement to perform this same behavior at the element level. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存储程序集限定类型名称的视图状态中的收集项。 stores assembly-qualified type names of the collection items in view state. 站点访问者无法解码的视图状态，检索的类型名称。A site visitor could decode the view state and retrieve the type name. 如果这种情况下在您的网站中创建安全隐患，你可以手动将其放在视图状态之前加密的类型名称。If this scenario creates a security concern in your Web site, you can manually encrypt the type name before placing it in the view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的强类型的集合以包含对象。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a strongly typed collection class from to contain objects. 在此示例中，`CycleCollection`派生以包含实例的抽象`Cycle`类，该类可以是`Bicycle`或`Tricycle`对象。In this example, the `CycleCollection` is derived to contain instances of the abstract `Cycle` class, which can be either `Bicycle` or `Tricycle` objects. `Cycle`类实现接口，因为它存储的值`CycleColor`视图状态中的属性。The `Cycle` class implements the interface because it stores the value of the `CycleColor` property in view state. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/CS/statemanagedcollectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/VB/statemanagedcollectionsample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在派生类中替代时，创建实现 的类的实例。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of a class that implements .

summary.span: 所创建对象的类型基于由 方法返回的集合的指定成员。

span.span: The type of object created is based on the specified member of the collection returned by the method.

span.span: An instance of a class derived from , according to the provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部调用方法在其实现的集合方法。The method is called internally by the collection in its implementation of the method. 重写的派生的集合方法返回的默认实例标识由提供的类型`index`，映射为返回类型之一方法。Derived collections override the method to return a default instance of the type identified by the provided `index`, which maps to one of the types returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何强类型化类实现方法。The following code example demonstrates how a strongly typed class implements the method. `CycleCollection`实现返回的默认实例`Bicycle`或`Tricycle`对象，具体取决于传递的索引。The `CycleCollection` implementation of returns the default instance of either a `Bicycle` or `Tricycle` object, depending on the index passed. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. exception.span: 用于不在派生的类中重写的所有情况。

summary.span: 在派生类中替代时，验证 集合的一个元素。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, validates an element of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法来验证通过操作的对象实现接口方法。The method is called to validate the object manipulated through the implementation of the interface methods. 默认实现是验证由集合操作的对象不是`null`; 但是，从派生的集合重写方法来执行任何其他验证，如类型检查。The default implementation is to verify that the object manipulated by the collection is not `null`; however, collections derived from override the method to perform any additional validation, such as type-checking.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 强制将整个 集合序列化为视图状态。

span.span: Forces the entire collection to be serialized into view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法强制集合以进行完全序列化 (而方法将节约仅更改信息)。The method forces the collection to be serialized completely (whereas the method saves only the change information). 在集合中的重要方式已更改，更改信息不足以重新创建该对象在内存中视图状态时，这非常有用。This is useful when a collection has changed in a significant way and change information is insufficient to recreate the object in memory from view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDirtyObject(object o) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub SetDirtyObject (o As Object)

param.name: o
param.span: 应对其自身进行完全序列化的 。

span.span: The that should serialize itself completely.

summary.span: 在派生类中替代时，指示集合包含的 将其全部状态记录到视图状态，而不是仅记录更改信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, instructs an contained by the collection to record its entire state to view state, rather than recording only change information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部调用方法， ，和方法。The method is called internally by the , , and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何强类型化类实现抽象方法。The following code example demonstrates how a strongly typed class implements the abstract method. `CycleCollection`使用对象，以便存储其视图状态信息，并只需将调用委托给方法对象。The `CycleCollection` uses a object to store its view-state information, and simply delegates the call to the method of the object. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object) Implements IStateManager.LoadViewState

param.name: savedState
param.span: 表示要还原的集合和集合元素的状态的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the collection and collection elements' state to restore.

summary.span: 还原 集合以及其包含的 项的以前保存的视图状态。

span.span: Restores the previously saved view state of the collection and the items it contains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还原保存的视图状态信息方法。This method restores view-state information that was saved by the method. 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1). 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 你可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。You can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance object System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState() cil managed
Function SaveViewState () As Object Implements IStateManager.SaveViewState

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后对 集合和该集合包含的每个 对象所做的更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the collection and each object it contains since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含对 及其包含的项的视图状态所做更改的对象。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state of the and the items it contains.

returns.span: 如果没有与集合及其元素关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the collection and its elements, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1). 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端为存储在一个 HTML 隐藏元素一个变量 (``)。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML hidden element (``). 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写此方法并修改你的服务器控件的提高效率属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1) and[ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 使 集合及其包含的每个 对象跟踪对它们的视图状态所做的更改，以使它们可以在相同页的请求之间得以保持。

span.span: Causes the collection and each of the objects it contains to track changes to their view state so they can be persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).
